title: MontagueETC's SCiPTEMBER 2022 Art
content:
=====
[[include component:preview
text=Thirty days of art.
]]
=====

[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block
name=SCiPTEMBER-2022-Thumbnail.png
|caption=MontagueETC's SCiPTEMBER 2022 Art
|width=100%
|align=center]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]

[[module CSS]]

:root{
  --header-title: "REMEMBER, REMEMBER";
  --header-subtitle: "THE FIRST OF SCiPTEMBER";
  --logo-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3AMontagueETC-sciptember-2022/Artistic%20Anomalies%20Department%20%28Inverted%29.png"); 
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    :root {
         --header-title: "RMBR, RMBR";
    }
}

[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
= **>> [[[MontagueETC|MontagueETC's Author Page]]] <<**
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[=]]

[[tabview]]

[[tab Day 1]]

++ Day 1: Factory 

++ [[[SCP-2271 | SCP-2271 - Factory Loans]]]

//In 100% of all reported cases, the letter within SCP-2271-1 will demand payment of a monetary amount that absolutely cannot be repaid, even if the subject had access to the total amount of all of Earth's liquid assets.//

Author: [[*user djkaktus]]

[[image SCP-2271.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 2]]

++ Day 2: Reanimation

++ [[[SCP-139 | SCP-139 - All Eyes on Lucian 👁]]]

//I'm not the first to run. But I might be the first to break free.//

Author: [[*user Nagiros]]

[[image SCP-139.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 3]]

++ Day 3: Twisted Pines

++ [[[SCP-2106 | SCP-2106 - A Conspiracy of Ravens]]]

//Do you think they dream about being me? Can ravens even dream?//

Author: [[*user Jacob Conwell]]

[[image SCP-2106.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 4]]

++ Day 4: Apian

++ [[[SCP-5993 | SCP-5993 - We want you to come visit Heaven, just don't fuck with those bees]]]

//For your Lord lived in fear of the bees. He knew of the danger they posed to Him, and determined them unworthy of freedom.//

Authors: [[*user Deadly Bread]] and [[*user ch00bakka]]

[[image SCP-5993.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 5]]

++ Day 5: Skeletal

++ [[[SCP-1049 | SCP-1049 - The Bonetaker Owl]]]

//...reports of boneless corpses being found in the nearby jungle...//

Author: [[*user TankCopter]]

[[image SCP-1049.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 6]]

++ Day 6: Future

++ [[[SCP-4861 | SCP-4861 - 12/11/2030]]]

//Yes, yes, take your time. You've got ten years of it, after all.//

Author: [[*user Tanhony]]

[[image SCP-4861.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 7]]

++ Day 7: Clockwork

++ [[[SCP-4511 | SCP-4511 - SWINE GOD.]]]

//SCP-4511's left flank contains a thin 5cm-long slit that, upon certain conditions being met, will print an index card carrying a series of instructions.//

Authors: [[*user Jade Skylar]] and [[*user Rounderhouse]]

[[image SCP-4511.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 8]]

++ Day 8: Hive Mind

++ [[[SCP-2316 | SCP-2316 - Field Trip]]]

//The following file contains images and text that are carriers for anomalous cognitohazardous influences. You do not recognize the bodies in the water.//

Author: [[*user djkaktus]]

[[image SCP-2316.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 9]]

++ Day 9: Cool War 2

++ [[[its-not-real-it-never-was-you-pathetic-fools | It's Not Real, It Never Was, You Pathetic Fools]]]

//With that, Lorem leaves the stage.//

//Or tries to, anyway.//

Author: [[*user Fishish]]

[[image ItNeverWas.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 10]]

++ Day 10: Ranine

++ [[[SCP-6142 | SCP-6142 - The Place Where We Used to Crucify Frogs]]]

//A call wouldn't go amiss, you know. An old man gets lonely.//

Author: [[*user Tanhony]]

[[image SCP-6142.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 11]]

++ Day 11: Eurtec

++ [[[scp-2744 | TATTLETALE - ENTRY REMOVED FROM DATABASE]]]

//Time remaining: 28:33//

Author: [[*user JakdragonX]]

[[image TATTLETALE.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 12]]

++ Day 12: Wilson's Wildlife

++ [[[critter-profile-zargoth | Critter Profile: ZARGOTH, DESTROYER OF DIMENSIONS!]]]

//##red|ZARGOTH, DESTROYER OF WORLDS## is the name for our little ##red|DEMONIC## snow goose. He's very, very ##red|NOT ADORABLE##, but he seems agitated that I keep bringing it up...//

Authors: [[*user DarkStuff]] and [[*user Ellie3]]

[[image ZARGOTH.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 13]]

++ Day 13: Moon

++ [[[SCP-5284 | SCP-5284 - Why the Black Moon Howls]]]

//I am Salu-ki. One Who Waits. One Who is Good. I wait for the Words.//

Author: [[*user The Great Hippo]]

[[image SCP-5284.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 14]]

++ Day 14: Miniature

++ [[[SCP-6420 | SCP-6420 - Arachno-lagophobia]]]

//Instances consumed the discarded legs for additional nourishment. Other than their peculiar diet, the anomalies exhibit typical rabbit behavior.//

Author: [[*user fairydoctor]]

[[image SCP-6420.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 15]]

++ Day 15: Map

++ [[[SCP-2332 | SCP-2332 - Thought Messenger]]]

//I’m from here. This place. Another side of the mirror.//

Author: [[*user Zyn]]

[[image SCP-2332.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 16]]

++ Day 16: Dental

++ [[[SCP-5852 | SCP-5852 - "You've got teeth in your bugs."]]]

//Following this event, all staff at Site-21 were scheduled for a mandatory tooth examination.//

Author: [[*user Cyvstvi]]

[[image SCP-5852.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 17]]

++ Day 17: Corporate

++ [[[SCP-3739 | SCP-3739 - Mind-Milk™ by Moosphere, Inc.]]]

//You'll Wonder Where the Red Went When You Brush Your Teeth with Moosphere Fresh Dreams™!//

Authors: [[*user Lt Flops]] and KindlyTurtleClem

[[image SCP-3739.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 18]]

++ Day 18: Hostile | Insect

++ [[[SCP-3615 | SCP-3615 - Depressed Divine Demon of Diptera & Diarrhea]]]

//I died. We all died. We did not come back.//

Author: [[*user mlister]]

[[image SCP-3615.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 19]]

++ Day 19: Dinosaurian

++ [[[SCP-2883 | SCP-2883 - A Rainbow, Holographic, Crystal Dinosaur]]]

//For those who've forgotten creativity.//

Author: [[*user Mf99k]]

[[image SCP-2883.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 20]]

++ Day 20: Esterberg

++ [[[wniosek-o-dotacje-na-opracowanie-srodka-przeciwko-alergii | GRANT REQUEST FOR THE CREATION OF A CURE FOR THE IRON ALLERGY NATIVE TO THE HOMO SAPIENS SIDHE SPECIES]]]

//Before we can light up a fire that will warm the entire world, worthy of a true Prometheus, we must first get rid of the wind that wants to snatch it from our hands.//

Authors: [[*user Ralliston]] and [[*user Jasiu06]]

[[image CURE.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 21]]

++ Day 21: Broken Masquerade

++ [[[SCP-6470 | SCP-6470 - Omnipresent]]]

//You are not to speak, no matter how quietly.//

Author: [[*user Lovesicker]]

[[image SCP-6470.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 22]]

++ Day 22: Immobile

++ [[[SCP-5557 | SCP-5557 - Balloon of Pseudo-Scotus]]]

//This one's not worth the hassle, boys.//

Author: [[*user MaliceAforethought]]

[[image SCP-5557.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 23]]

++ Day 23: Mathematical

++ [[[SCP-7K-J | SCP-7K-J - Upvote/Downvote Coin]]]

//Better luck next time.//

Authors: [[*user DodoDevil]], [[*user Elenee FishTruck]], [[*user Fishish]], [[*user GremlinGroup]], [[*user LORDXVNV]], [[*user R4_EX]], and [[*user stormbreath]]

[[image SCP-7K-J.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 24]]

++ Day 24: Omnivorous

++ [[[SCP-6062 | SCP-6062 - King Ratthew Splondis XVIII, Bearer of Pestilence and Lord of All Rodents]]]

//SCP-6062 frequently consumes its own waste and excess. When asked about this, it claims it is "Keeping the royal bloodline pure".//

Author: [[*user J Dune]]

[[image SCP-6062.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 25]]

++ Day 25: Performance

++ [[[SCP-3713 | SCP-3713 - All the World’s a Stage]]]

//The full repeated line was "Someone is slacking, someone is drowning, someone is drowning and we're drowning with her".//

Authors: [[*user DarkStuff]] and [[*user Varaxous]]

[[image SCP-3713.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 26]]

++ Day 26: Three Moons Initiative

++ [[[SCP-4839 | SCP-4839 - FAFNIR - or, "I Caress It, 'Cause I Possess It!"]]]

//Items that carry SCP-4839 are to be put in boxes and never taken out.//

Author: [[*user daveyoufool]]

[[image SCP-4839.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 27]]

++ Day 27: Tactical Theology

++ [[[SCP-5693 | SCP-5693 - If you want to know what God thinks about money, just look at the people he gives it to]]]

//As to prevent unnecessary expansion of the colony, personnel assigned to SCP-5693 are to have little to no viewpoints on religion or religious matters.//

Author: [[*user Deadly Bread]]

[[image SCP-5693.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 28]]

++ Day 28: Shadow

++ [[[SCP-012-EX | SCP-012-EX - Eurydice]]]

//This file must not be read in the dark. Please ensure your environment is sufficiently well-lit before proceeding.//

Author: [[*user S D Locke]]

[[image SCP-012-EX.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 29]]

++ Day 29: Selachian

++ [[[SCP-1057 | SCP-1057 - Absence of Shark]]]

//SCP-1057 is an animate empty space, five (5) meters long, in the shape of an adult tiger shark (Galeocerdo cuvier).//

Author: [[*user Voct]]

[[image SCP-1057.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Day 30]]

++ Day 30: 7000

++ [[[SCP-7002 | SCP-7002 - The Hungry Season]]]

//First the wheat turned yellow, then brown, then gray and black. It's gone all dusty now. My boy picked some up and hasn't been able to get it off his hand in three days of scrubbing.//

Author: [[*user bigslothonmyface]]

[[image SCP-7002.png]]

[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]

[[/=]]
